INTRO_TEXT: Our professional cleaners in Stockholm and the surrounding areas offer environmentally friendly and high-quality cleaning services for both individuals and businesses. We maintain a high standard of quality – if you would like to use our services, contact us today to book your cleaning.
PRIVATE_DESC: Clean, fresh, and cozy — we keep your house spotless.
APARTMENT_DESC: Fast, flexible cleaning for a tidy, stress-free apartment.
OFFICE_DESC: A clean office for a healthy, productive workday.
ABOUT_HEADING: - Bringing Excellence in Residential & Commercial cleaning services
SERVICES_SECTION_DESC: We offer reliable cleaning for homes, apartments, and offices — keeping your spaces fresh, healthy, and spotless.
PRIVATE_SERVICES_DESC: Deep cleaning that leaves your old home spotless and ready for the next resident.
COMPANIES_SERVICES_DESC: Crystal-clear windows for a brighter, cleaner home or office.
SCHOOL_SERVICES_DESC: Regular, reliable cleaning to keep your home fresh and tidy every day.
REQUEST_DESC: Leave your details and our team will get back to you shortly to discuss your cleaning needs.
FORM_FAIL: Form submission failed. Please check all required fields.
OUR_GOAL_HEADING: It all started with just three people
OUR_GOAL_TEXT1: We began with three passionate people and a clear mission — to provide top-quality cleaning across Sweden. A clean space means better health, comfort, and productivity.
OUR_GOAL_TEXT2: We’ve grown but stayed true to trust, detail, and customer care. Each service is tailored to your needs. Using eco-friendly products, we protect the planet while making your space fresh and welcoming. At VardagsHjälte, we don’t just clean — we create places where you feel cared for.
OUR_AIM_TEXT: We strive to provide top-quality, eco-friendly cleaning services while building long-term relationships based on trust, reliability, and customer satisfaction.
COMPANY_VISION_TEXT: Our vision is to become Sweden’s most trusted cleaning company by delivering sustainable, high-quality services that improve everyday life for our customers.
THE_PROCEDURE_TEXT: Our cleaning process is simple, efficient, and focused on quality. From the first contact to the final check, we handle everything with care and professionalism.
CONTACT_DESC: Need help or want to know more? Our experts are ready to assist you with all your cleaning needs. Get in touch today!
NAME: Name
NAME_MINLENGTH: Name must be at least 2 characters.

FOOTER_TEXT: We help you define your cleaning needs and create the best plan to keep your spaces spotless and healthy.
